name: toweringly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
literary in a way that is very tall, often making people feel respect: My uncle was a toweringly tall man. The castle walls rose toweringly out of the mist.
extremely: He used his toweringly strong personality to dominate meetings. "In the Court of the Crimson King" is a toweringly brilliant album.
More examplesFewer examplesHe is so toweringly tall that he has to stoop every time to walk through a doorway.The film was so toweringly good that I felt like standing up and applauding.The country's railway system is toweringly disappointing.
